docblock.description: This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.
This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.
This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.
A ServiceLocator implementation for loading and retaining formatter objects.
A registry to retain formatter objects.

tag.name: param
tag.description: An array of key-value pairs where the key is the formatter name (doubles as a method name) and the value is the formatter object. The value may also be a closure that returns a formatter object. Note that is has to be a closure, not just any callable, because the formatter object itself might be callable.

docblock.description: Sets a formatter into the registry by name.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The formatter name; this doubles as a method name when called from a template.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The formatter specification, typically a closure that builds and returns a formatter object.

docblock.description: Gets a formatter from the registry by name.
This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.
Uses php intl extension to format messages
Format the message with the help of php intl extension
This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.
Message keys and translations in this package.
The name of a fallback package to use when a message key does not exist.
The name of the formatter to use when formatting translated messages.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the formatter to use.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the fallback package to use.

docblock.description: Sets the messages for this package.
Gets the messages for this package.
Sets the formatter name for this package.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The formatter name for this package.

docblock.description: Gets the formatter name for this package.
This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.
A ServiceLocator implementation for loading and retaining translator objects.

docblock.long-description: Unlike many other registries, this one is two layers deep. The first key is a package name, the second key is a locale code, and the value is the package information for that name and locale.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The package object, or a callable to create and return one.

docblock.description: This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The package object, or a callable to create and return one.

docblock.description: This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.
The formatter to use when translating messages.
The locale being used for translations.
Gets the message translation by its key.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The message translation string, or false if not found.

docblock.description: Translates the message indicated by they key, replacing token values along the way.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Token values to interpolate into the message.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The translated message with tokens replaced.

docblock.description: This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.
The class to use for new instances.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The locale code for the translator.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The localized messages for the translator.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The formatter to use for interpolating token values.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A fallback translator to use, if any.

docblock.description: This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.
This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.
A ServiceLocator implementation for loading and retaining translator objects.
A registry to retain translator objects.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A translator factory to create translator objects for the locale and package.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The default locale code to use.

docblock.description: Gets a translator from the registry by package for a locale.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The locale to use; if empty, uses the default locale.
